briefTitle: Neoadjuvant Study of DV in Combination Toripalimab or Sequence Chemotherapy in HR-negative, HER2 Low-expressing Breast Cancer
officialTitle: A Randomized, Multicenter, Open-Label Phase II Neoadjuvant Study to Evaluate the Safety and Efficacy of Disitamab Vedotin in Combination Toripalimab or Sequence Chemotherapy in Participants With HR-negative, HER2 Low-expressing Breast Cancer
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Total pathological complete response (tpCR) rate (ypT0/Tis ypN0)
